text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium macrosclerotiorum is a species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated from soil in south China.
text.Further reading:
Wang, L.; Zhang, X. M.; Zhuang, W. Y. (2007). "Penicillium macrosclerotiorum, a new species producing large sclerotia discovered in south China". Mycological Research. 111 (10): 1242. doi:10.1016/j.mycres.2007.06.017. PMID 17998158.
